page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Much of the {employment }in this area is on the land,there is one {garage} and a {dress shop}both employing one person each,the {Hunday Farm and {Tractor Museum}also employs local people.{Mowden Hall School }is the major employer but most of the teaching staff come from outside the area.The domestic side however,as at {Stelling Hall }is looked after by local people.Because the area is sparsely populated unemployment is not the problem it is in a city.Those seeking employment outside the area would need their own transport as only a very poor bus service exists,with bus stops quite a long walk away from the houses and farms.A special coach takes children from the farms to schools outside the area,but this means that out of school activities may be curtailed,unless parents help.
